verses.verse: A <S%H376>man<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3878>Levi<s%> <S%H3212>went<s%> and <S%H3947>took<s%> a <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of Levi as his <S%H3878>wife.<s%>

The <S%H802>woman<s%> <S%H2029>conceived,<s%> and <S%H3205>bore<s%> a <S%H1121>son.<s%> When she <S%H7200>saw<s%> that he was a <S%H2896>fine<s%> <S%H6845>child,<s%> she hid him <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3391>months.<s%>

When she <S%H3201>could<s%> no <S%H5750>longer<s%> <S%H6845>hide<s%> <S%H3947>him,<s%> she took a <S%H1573>papyrus<s%> <S%H8392>basket<s%> for <S%H2560>him,<s%> and coated it with <S%H2564>tar<s%> and with <S%H2203>pitch.<s%> She <S%H7760>put<s%> the <S%H3206>child<s%> in <S%H7760>it,<s%> and laid it in the <S%H5488>reeds<s%> by the <S%H2975>river<s%>'s <S%H8193>bank.<s%>
His <S%H269>sister<s%> <S%H3320>stood<s%> far <S%H7350>off,<s%> to <S%H3045>see<s%> what would be done to <S%H6213>him.<s%>

<S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%>'s <S%H1323>daughter<s%> came <S%H3381>down<s%> to <S%H7364>bathe<s%> at the <S%H2975>river.<s%> Her <S%H5291>maidens<s%> <S%H1980>walked<s%> along by <S%H2975>the<s%> <S%H3027>riverside.<s%> She <S%H7200>saw<s%> the <S%H8392>basket<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> the <S%H5488>reeds,<s%> and <S%H7971>sent<s%> her <S%H519>handmaid<s%> to get <S%H3947>it.<s%>

She <S%H6605>opened<s%> <S%H7200>it,<s%> and saw the <S%H3206>child,<s%> and <S%H5288>behold,<s%> the baby <S%H1058>cried.<s%> She had <S%H2550>compassion<s%> on <S%H559>him,<s%> and said, "This is one of the <S%H5680>Hebrews<s%>' <S%H3206>children.<s%>"

Then his <S%H269>sister<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%>'s <S%H1323>daughter,<s%> "Should I <S%H3212>go<s%> and <S%H7121>call<s%> a <S%H3243>nurse<s%> for you from the <S%H5680>Hebrew<s%> <S%H802>women,<s%> that she may <S%H3243>nurse<s%> the child for <S%H3206>you?<s%>"
<S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%>'s <S%H1323>daughter<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3212>her,<s%> "Go." The <S%H5959>maiden<s%> <S%H3212>went<s%> and <S%H7121>called<s%> the <S%H3206>child<s%>'s <S%H517>mother.<s%>

<S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%>'s <S%H1323>daughter<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3212>her,<s%> "Take this <S%H3206>child<s%> <S%H3212>away,<s%> and <S%H3243>nurse<s%> him for <S%H5414>me,<s%> and I will give you your <S%H7939>wages.<s%>" The <S%H802>woman<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H3206>child,<s%> and nursed <S%H5134>it.<s%>

The <S%H3206>child<s%> <S%H1431>grew,<s%> and she <S%H935>brought<s%> him to <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%>'s <S%H1323>daughter,<s%> and he became her <S%H1121>son.<s%> She <S%H8034>named<s%> <S%H7121>him<s%> <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> "Because I <S%H4871>drew<s%> him out of the <S%H4325>water.<s%>"

It happened in those <S%H3117>days,<s%> when <S%H4872>Moses<s%> had <S%H1431>grown<s%> <S%H3318>up,<s%> that he went out to his <S%H251>brothers,<s%> and <S%H7200>looked<s%> at their <S%H5450>burdens.<s%> He <S%H7200>saw<s%> an <S%H4713>Egyptian<s%> <S%H5221>striking<s%> a <S%H5680>Hebrew,<s%> one of his <S%H251>brothers.<s%>

He <S%H6437>looked<s%> this <S%H3541>way<s%> and that <S%H3541>way,<s%> and when he <S%H7200>saw<s%> that there was no <S%H376>one,<s%> he <S%H5221>killed<s%> the <S%H4713>Egyptian,<s%> and <S%H2934>hid<s%> him in the <S%H2344>sand.<s%>

He went <S%H3318>out<s%> the <S%H8145>second<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> and <S%H8147>behold,<s%> two <S%H582>men<s%> of the <S%H5680>Hebrews<s%> were <S%H5327>fighting<s%> with each <S%H559>other.<s%> He said to him who did the <S%H7563>wrong,<s%> "Why do you <S%H5221>strike<s%> your <S%H7453>fellow?<s%>"

He <S%H559>said,<s%> "Who <S%H7760>made<s%> <S%H376>you<s%> a <S%H8269>prince<s%> and a <S%H8199>judge<s%> over <S%H559>us?<s%> Do you plan to <S%H2026>kill<s%> <S%H2026>me,<s%> as you killed the <S%H4713>Egyptian?<s%>" <S%H4872>Moses<s%> was <S%H3372>afraid,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H403>"Surely<s%> this <S%H1697>thing<s%> is <S%H3045>known.<s%>"

Now when <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> this <S%H1697>thing,<s%> he <S%H1245>sought<s%> to <S%H2026>kill<s%> <S%H4872>Moses.<s%> But <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H1272>fled<s%> from the <S%H6440>face<s%> of <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> and <S%H3427>lived<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4080>Midian,<s%> and he sat <S%H3427>down<s%> by a <S%H875>well.<s%>

Now the <S%H3548>priest<s%> of <S%H4080>Midian<s%> had <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H1323>daughters.<s%> They <S%H935>came<s%> and <S%H1802>drew<s%> <S%H4390>water,<s%> and filled the <S%H7298>troughs<s%> to <S%H8248>water<s%> their <S%H1>father<s%>'s <S%H6629>flock.<s%>

The <S%H7462>shepherds<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> and drove them <S%H1644>away;<s%> but <S%H4872>Moses<s%> stood <S%H6965>up<s%> and <S%H3467>helped<s%> <S%H8248>them,<s%> and watered their <S%H6629>flock.<s%>
When they <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H7467>Reuel,<s%> their <S%H1>father,<s%> he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H4069>"How<s%> is it that you have <S%H935>returned<s%> so <S%H4116>early<s%> <S%H3117>today?<s%>"

They <S%H559>said,<s%> "An <S%H4713>Egyptian<s%> <S%H5337>delivered<s%> us out of the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H7462>shepherds,<s%> and moreover he <S%H1802>drew<s%> <S%H1802>water<s%> for <S%H8248>us,<s%> and watered the <S%H6629>flock.<s%>"
He <S%H559>said<s%> to his <S%H1323>daughters,<s%> "Where is <S%H5800>he?<s%> Why is it that you have left the <S%H376>man?<s%> <S%H7121>Call<s%> <S%H398>him,<s%> that he may eat <S%H3899>bread.<s%>"
<S%H4872>Moses<s%> was <S%H2974>content<s%> to <S%H3427>dwell<s%> with the <S%H376>man.<s%> He <S%H5414>gave<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H6855>Zipporah,<s%> his <S%H1323>daughter.<s%>

She <S%H3205>bore<s%> a <S%H1121>son,<s%> and he <S%H8034>named<s%> <S%H7121>him<s%> <S%H1647>Gershom,<s%> for he <S%H559>said,<s%> "I have lived as a <S%H1616>foreigner<s%> in a <S%H5237>foreign<s%> <S%H776>land.<s%>"

It happened in the <S%H1992>course<s%> of those many <S%H3117>days,<s%> that the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> <S%H4191>died,<s%> and the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H584>sighed<s%> because <S%H4480>of<s%> the <S%H5656>bondage,<s%> and they <S%H2199>cried,<s%> and their <S%H7775>cry<s%> came <S%H5927>up<s%> to <S%H430>God<s%> because of the <S%H5656>bondage.<s%>

<S%H430>God<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> their <S%H5009>groaning,<s%> and <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H2142>remembered<s%> his <S%H1285>covenant<s%> with <S%H85>Abraham,<s%> with <S%H3327>Isaac,<s%> and with <S%H3290>Jacob.<s%>
<S%H430>God<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and <S%H430>God<s%> was concerned about <S%H3045>them.<s%>
